PAGE_LOCKED.TITLE: Page locked
PAGE_LOCKED.DESCRIPTION: Wait wait, someone else is currently editing this page!
PAGE_LOCKED.DESCRIPTION_USER: Wait wait, {user} is currently editing this page!

PAGE_LOCKED_QUEUE.TITLE: Page locked
PAGE_LOCKED_QUEUE.DESCRIPTION: There are several users waiting to edit this page, please try again later.
PAGE_LOCKED_QUEUE.DESCRIPTION_USER: There are several users waiting to access this page, currently edited by {user}. Please try again later.

ACCESS_REQUEST_RECEIVED.TITLE: New access request
ACCESS_REQUEST_RECEIVED.DESCRIPTION: Another user asked to access this page. If you accept, your session will be closed immediately.
ACCESS_REQUEST_RECEIVED.DESCRIPTION_USER: {user} asked to access this page. If you accept, your session will be closed immediately.

ACCESS_GRANTED.TITLE: Access granted
ACCESS_GRANTED.DESCRIPTION: You've been granted the access to the current page, have fun!

ACCESS_REJECTED.TITLE: Access rejected
ACCESS_REJECTED.DESCRIPTION: Unfortunately your request to access this page has been rejected, sorry.

ACCESS_FORCED.TITLE: Session closed
ACCESS_FORCED.DESCRIPTION: Someone else forced the access to this page, therefore your session has been closed.
ACCESS_FORCED.DESCRIPTION_USER: {user} forced the access to this page, therefore your session has been closed.

ACCESS_FORCED_CONFIRM.TITLE: Access granted
ACCESS_FORCED_CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: Now you're the owner of this page, have fun!

ACCESS_REQUEST_SENT.TITLE: Request sent
ACCESS_REQUEST_SENT.DESCRIPTION: We've sent your access request to the user. You can force the access anytime.
ACCESS_REQUEST_SENT.DESCRIPTION_USER: We've sent your access request to {user}. You can force the access anytime.
